meta.title: Minnesota Transitions Charter School, a K-12 Academic Community

meta.name: description
meta.content: Minnesota Transitions Charter School is a tuition-free, public K-12 academic community. With in-school, online and specialized options, we serve the Twin Cities and greater Minnesota.

div.h2: Seven Schools in Minneapolis & Two Online School Options!

p.span: MTCS enhances the lives of students with programs and support that prepare them for life—academically, culturally, emotionally and socially.

div.p: Our Mission: We are a student-centered learning community that inspires and supports all learners to achieve excellence through equitable, relevant learning experiences.
